ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: But they still look cool when you hand them a big honking weapon. :-) luv, -Su ps. why don t wizards get pets? *cries* ... wont ... axe? ... battle ... not ...
ygData.messageBody:
But they still look cool when you hand them a big honking weapon. :-)
luv,
-Su
ps. why don't wizards get pets? *cries*

> My pet wont equip one, I've tried but it doesnt matter anyways as they
wont
> do more dmg even with higher dmg weapons.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2001 11:34 PM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets
>
>
> That reminds me....I've heard that pet's have a static delay time when
> swinging...
>
> If this is true...then wouldn't it be great to hand your pet a weighted
axe?
> 50 dam 150 delay ( i think these are the stats )
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Nygaardr, FC3 [SMTP:nygaardr@...]
> > Sent: Friday, April 13, 2001 5:44 AM
> > To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
> >
> > Yeah, I said they made good pet weapons. Never said a player of any lvl
> > should use them.
> >
> > Mu
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
> > Sent: Friday, April 13, 2001 2:44 AM
> > To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
> >

> > Just stating I'd rather that my weapon/armor knocked em dead on the
battle
> > field then in a fashion show :> (sorry my TRY at wit)
> >
> > >On a side note the Kobolds near the king, maybe other places too I'm
not
> > > sure, drop some of THE BEST looking weapons in the game. Stats not
too
> > > good about like FS but the looks are great.
